company_context: The #1 AI CRM Suite for Business & Customer Success | Salesforce IN Skip to content Get Started with Salesforce, the All-in-One CRM - Free! The #1 AI CRM for Business Humans and agents drive customer success together. Agentforce transforms Sales, Service, Commerce, Marketing, IT, and more by uniting apps, data, and agents on one trusted platform. Now every department is an engine for growing customer success — from Sales following up on every lead instantly to Service delivering 24/7 expertise. Proven ROI, delivered. Explore Agentforce Calculate your ROI Grow fast with our free CRM. See value from day one with our free, all-in-one CRM built for small businesses . Stop juggling spreadsheets and disconnected apps. Bring customer activity, pipeline, marketing campaigns, and service cases into one place. Start getting more done day-to-day and get full visibility into your business. Free. Get it for free. See full pricing Start for free Start demo 2.5M+ conversations handled by Agentforce and counting. Everyone talks the AI talk. We’re walking the walk. See our stories Experience Salesforce Help Group CIO, Ambuja Neotia Group Kripadyuti Sarkar Salesforce gave us the agility and ease of use to quickly build the transparent and service-oriented journeys that define our customer philosophy. This is key to serving our real estate customers with the empathy they deserve. See the Ambuja Neotia story VP, Strategy & Transformation, PepsiCo Tracy Matis See PepsiCo story Business Owner of Salesforce ONE.CRM & Customer Care, Volkswagen Group Stephanie Paetow Agentforce will enable us to have personalization across those customer journey pre-sales sales and after sales. Every touch point, at the right time with the right message, based on a 360° view. But we don’t have 80 million staff to be able to scale it, and the only way to do that is to innovate. In our case it’s innovating through the use of Salesforce. See the Heathrow story Enterprise Vice President, Strategy | Pricing | Product Mark Columbo The culture at Salesforce of being customer obsessed is a leading attribute. Salesforce is constantly innovating and constantly creating new value. I just can't say enough about how well the teams have come together to delight our customers. See the FedEx story Salesforce is the platform for the Agentic Enterprise. Our deeply unified platform brings together apps, data, agents, and metadata to drive customer and employee success. With trust and governance built in, Salesforce ensures your AI and business scale securely, reliably, and with confidence. See all products Launch faster with 16+ Agentforce

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi [CTO Name], this is Alex from DeepData AI. I hope I'm not catching you at a bad time. I'm reaching out because we specialize in helping companies like yours leverage their existing customer data to drive significant efficiency gains in their AI initiatives. I saw that Ambuja Neotia Group, where you're CTO, is using Salesforce's Agentforce, and we've had great success integrating with platforms like that to unlock even deeper insights from the data they already collect.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Alex, thanks for the call, but honestly, we're pretty swamped right now. Salesforce handles our CRM and customer success needs quite well. We have a solid data strategy in place, and I'm not sure what you can offer that we don't already have covered.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand you're busy, [CTO Name], and it's great that Salesforce is working for you. Agentforce is a powerful platform. What we often find, however, is that the raw data within CRMs, while structured for customer interactions, can be further optimized for sophisticated AI models. DeepData AI works by augmenting that data with external sources and performing advanced pre-processing, which can significantly improve the accuracy and performance of your existing AI tools, leading to even higher lead conversion and more autonomous case resolution, as you've seen with Agentforce.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: "Augmenting" and "pre-processing" sounds like more complexity and frankly, more cost. We've invested a significant amount in our current Salesforce ecosystem, and introducing another layer of data processing seems like it could create integration headaches and potentially duplicate efforts. What kind of integration are we even talking about here?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a fair concern, [CTO Name]. We've designed DeepData AI to be highly compatible. Our integration typically involves secure API connections that pull data from your Salesforce instance, process it using our proprietary algorithms, and then push the enhanced data back in a format that your AI models can readily consume, or even provide direct access to the enriched datasets. We don't replace your CRM; we empower it. Many of our clients find that by improving their data quality and depth, they actually reduce the computational overhead on their AI models, leading to cost savings in the long run, not increases.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Look, Alex, I appreciate the explanation, but "long run cost savings" isn't a priority for us right now. We're focused on optimizing our existing investments. We have our roadmap, and data processing enhancements aren't on it for the next 12-18 months. We're happy with our current performance.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I hear you, [CTO Name]. It's a challenge to constantly evaluate new solutions when you're happy with what you have. However, the landscape of AI is evolving so rapidly. Companies that can unlock deeper, more nuanced insights from their data are consistently outpacing competitors. We've seen clients achieve an additional 15% marketing pipeline growth and a 1.8x increase in lead conversion simply by optimizing their data with DeepData AI. It might be worth a brief 15-minute call to see if there's a hidden opportunity within your existing data that could be driving even better results, without disrupting your current roadmap.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Alex, I'm going to have to stop you there. While I understand the value proposition you're presenting, it's just not a priority for us at this moment. We have existing solutions and a clear direction. I'm not interested in exploring this further right now. Thank you for your time.

analysis.raw:
Score: 2
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Timing
Feedback: The seller should have focused more on understanding the buyer's immediate priorities rather than pushing their solution. Sentiment: Negative

parsed.feedback: The seller should have focused more on understanding the buyer's immediate priorities rather than pushing their solution. Sentiment: Negative
